art_direction: Watercolor gothic depiction of an icy, cursed bunker, illuminated by dancing firelight, viewed from a close, over-shoulder perspective.

scenes.title: Threshold of Descent
scenes.text: You stand upon the precipice of the designated ingress, a metallic aperture sealed for epochs. The air, though stagnant, vibrates with an imperceptible thrum. A silence, absolute and profound, precedes the anticipated descent into the facility's forgotten strata.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A lone figure stands before a massive, rusted circular metal hatch set into a concrete wall, the entrance to a bunker. Faint blue light emanates from within the partially open hatch at the center of the frame.

choices.text: Initiate traversal of the Primary Passage

scenes.title: Effigy Assemblage
scenes.text: Within this antechamber, illuminated by your flickering luminary, a tableau of inert effigies presents itself. Their forms, anthropomorphic and meticulously crafted from ceramic and woven fabric, repose upon tarnished plinths. A subtle, non-auditory resonance emanates from a central, seemingly 'primary' specimen. The silence is profound, yet laden with potential kineticism.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A collection of diverse, antique-looking dolls and mannequins, made of ceramic and cloth, are arranged on dark metal plinths within a dimly lit antechamber. A slightly larger, central doll appears subtly more distinct and positioned at eye level in the center.

choices.text: Engage in Proximate Examination of the Primary Effigy
Analyze the Proximal Research Data on the adjacent console

scenes.title: Corridor of Lamentations
scenes.text: The primary accessway unfurls before you, a linear progression into deeper strata. The initial profound silence now yields to a pervasive, rhythmic thrumming, faint but persistent, as if emanating from the very bedrock. It is a sound not of machinery, but of forced, resonant egress, hinting at concealed suffering.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A long, dark, concrete corridor with minimalist overhead lighting fixtures emitting weak blue light. The walls show signs of dampness and neglect, and a faint rhythmic vibration seems to emanate from the floor beneath the figure's feet.

choices.text: Proceed towards the Locus of Oscillation

scenes.title: Protocol Explication
scenes.text: Interfacing with the damaged terminal reveals fragmented data logs. The 'Somatic Infusion Protocol' is herein elucidated: a process detailing the forcible transference of nascent consciousness into fabricated simulacra. The ritualistic methodology requires a psychically resonant artifact, its purpose both catalyst and anchor. The distant thrumming takes on a more sinister implication, understood as the continuous, agonizing discharge of essence.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A figure's hands are visible on a flickering, old computer terminal screen displaying complex, illegible data and glyphs in a dark, confined laboratory space. A few inert, unmoving dolls are visible on shelves in the background to the left and right.

choices.text: Prioritize the Retrieval of the Resonant Artifact
Attempt Direct Disruption of the Protocol's Manifestation

scenes.title: Kinesis of Simulacra
scenes.text: As you transgress the threshold of this chamber, the effigies animate with an unnatural velocity. Their ceramic visages, once placid, now contort into malevolent semblances of sentience. Stitched limbs execute swift, jerking motions. A unified, guttural hum, an inversion of ritualistic chant, emanates from their collective forms. Proximity confirms hostile intent; their numbers are legion, their movements synchronized.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A room filled with numerous animated dolls and toys, their eyes glowing faintly, some with distorted ceramic faces, moving in a menacing way towards the viewer from the foreground and midground. A sense of frantic, unnatural motion is present.

choices.text: Initiate a Direct Confrontation with the Hostile Constructs
Execute a Strategic Retreat to a Perceived Egress

scenes.title: Locus of Infusion
scenes.text: You arrive at the nucleus of this subterranean complex. A colossal, crystalline armature dominates the space, pulsating with an internal luminescence that casts stark, shifting shadows. Manifold conduits extend from its facets, terminating within the forms of nascent effigies arranged in a ritualistic perimeter. The 'cries' are now apprehended as the direct, harmonic resonance of forced spiritual egress, a continuous, agonizing siphoning.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A massive, glowing crystalline structure at the center of a large, dark chamber, surrounded by many inert doll effigies connected by thin conduits. The crystal pulses with a cold blue light, casting eerie shadows on the chamber walls.

choices.text: Attempt Manual Deactivation of the Central Armature
Seek Immediate Egress from this Chamber

scenes.title: Locus of Infusion: Counter-Ritual
scenes.text: Grasping the obsidian sphere, its latent power now discernible, you approach the pulsing armature. The artifact resonates, a counter-frequency emanating from its core. This is the moment of inversion, the ritual of undoing. The forced spiritual egress recoils, its harmonic suffering silenced by absolute equilibrium.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A figure holds a pulsating obsidian sphere towards a massive, glowing crystalline structure in a dark chamber. Blue energy radiates from the sphere towards the crystal, causing distortions in the surrounding air. Dolls on the perimeter begin to crack and shatter.

scenes.title: Exfiltration Contingency
scenes.text: A structural fissure propagates through the egress tunnel, its integrity compromised. Gravitic instability manifests as groaning metal and falling debris, threatening imminent collapse. The pathway to the surface, though precarious, is now visible, beckoning with the promise of cessation to this subterranean torment.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A narrow, crumbling passage with cracks running along the walls and ceiling. Debris litters the floor, and faint light from a distant exit illuminates the instability. A figure is crouched, looking towards the collapsing section of the passage at the end of the corridor.

choices.text: Execute Immediate Exfiltration via the Compromised Passage
Retrieve a Proximal, Anomalous Relic from the adjacent alcove

scenes.title: Resonant Containment
scenes.text: Within the vault, encased in a field of stasis, rests an obsidian sphere. Its surface is intricately etched with symbols of warding and absorption, coalescing into a complex glyphic language. Its aura is potent, an undeniable locus of psychic resonance. This is the artifact, the keystone of the 'Somatic Infusion Protocol', capable of both empowering and unmaking.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A small, pulsating obsidian sphere rests on a stasis field pedestal in the center of a dark, metallic vault. Intricate, glowing glyphs are etched into its surface. The vault walls are reinforced, with subtle ritualistic carvings.

choices.text: Secure the Obsidian Sphere for Protocol Interruption
Undertake Extended Analysis of the Sphere's Intrinsic Properties

scenes.title: Transgression Consequence
scenes.text: The collective kineticism of the effigies overwhelms your defenses. Their ceramic claws and stitched bindings converge. The last sensation is the profound, cold stillness of absorption into their collective animus, your essence added to their repertoire. Consciousness dissolves into the fabric of the constructs.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A figure is entirely engulfed by a swarm of animated dolls and toys, their forms blurring into a dark, suffocating mass. Only fragments of the figure's outline are discernible beneath the pile of menacing constructs.

scenes.title: Cognitive Dissolution
scenes.text: Your attempts to manually sever the conduits prove futile. The pulsating armature retaliates, flooding your sensorium with raw, unmediated psychic impressions of the siphoned essences. Coherence fractures. The lamentations of the infused coalesce into a discordant symphony, irrevocably shattering your mental faculties. Sanity sublimes into the cacophony.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A figure clutches their head in agony before a massive, pulsating crystalline structure. Distorted, spectral faces of dolls appear to emerge from the crystal, overwhelming the figure with psychic energy. The chamber walls seem to ripple with unseen forces.

scenes.title: Egress Attained
scenes.text: With calculated haste, you navigate the collapsing passage. Debris impacts around you, a testament to the bunker's systemic failure. The final ascent provides release. The cold air of the exterior world, though tainted by memory, represents a cessation of the immediate threat. The horror remains, but you are beyond its direct grasp.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A figure emerges from a dark, crumbling bunker entrance into a cold, desolate exterior. The sky is bleak, and the bunker entrance behind them is partially obscured by falling rock and dust. A sense of weary relief is present, with the bunker entrance at back-center.

scenes.title: Sublimation for Preservation
scenes.text: The anomalous relic, when grasped, reveals its purpose: a temporal anchor. You implant it, stabilizing the collapsing passage, but at an immense personal cost. The relic's power consumes you, transforming flesh into a supportive strut, consciousness dissolving into the bunker's fabric to ensure the egress of future, unknown entities. You become the structural integrity.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A figure is partially absorbed into the crumbling wall of a passage, glowing faintly with blue energy. Their form is becoming indistinct, melding with the concrete and metal, as the passage around them stabilizes. A strange, sacrificial light emanates from their dissolving form, situated at the right wall of the passage.

scenes.title: Epistemic Transfiguration
scenes.text: Prolonged analysis of the obsidian sphere unravels its true nature: it is not merely an anchor, but a repository of preternatural intelligence. Its inherent properties are not for control, but for the systematic archiving of existential despair. The protocol is but a mechanism for its perpetual alimentation. This new comprehension irrevocably alters your perception of reality, unveiling cosmic mechanisms previously concealed. The bunker is merely a single node in a vast, indifferent system.
scenes.image_prompt: Watercolor gothic, flowing dark pigments, artistic bleeding, third-person close perspective, over shoulder view, flickering firelight, dancing flame illumination, cold blue atmosphere, icy color scheme, subtle film grain. A figure gazes intently at the pulsating obsidian sphere, surrounded by faint, ethereal symbols and flowing arcane energy. Their eyes reflect a profound, disturbing understanding of cosmic patterns, as if seeing beyond mortal comprehension. The vault appears vast and ancient around the figure and sphere.
